scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with Jesus centrally positioned on the cross, bleeding and wearing a loincloth. To his left and right are two thieves, also crucified. Below, a group of mourners, including the Virgin Mary in a blue mantle and another woman in a pink garment, are gathered on the left. On the right, soldiers in armor and a man in an orange robe observe the scene. In the background, a skull lies on the ground, and a distant city with a prominent spire is visible under a dark sky. The overall atmosphere is somber and dramatic, emphasizing the suffering and death of Christ.
